name: P48_30s
prompt: suburban home driveway and front yard, viewed from an elevated position on the garage, looking down at the driveway at night. Single porch light provides harsh overhead illumination with deep shadows. An unfamiliar dark sedan, license plate visible, tinted windows, parks in driveway. Headlights illuminate driveway, car parks, interior light shows occupant exiting. Static elevated viewpoint, wide field of view covering driveway and street approach, slight barrel distortion at edges, IR-tinted footage quality with slight grain. Real-time speed, natural fluid human motion at 1x playback rate.
negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, artifacts, glitches, distorted, unrealistic motion, multiple camera angles, jump cuts, visible camera, security camera device, doorbell camera, camera lens visible, camera equipment, camera housing, surveillance camera in frame, camera mount, camera on wall, camera on ceiling, camera rig, recording device in shot, gopro, webcam, CCTV camera visible, Ring doorbell visible, Nest camera visible, slow motion, time lapse, fast forward, sped up, slowed down
